name: cLiMaTe CrUsAdErS
description:
Firstly, yes the title is stylised that way. Don't damn ask.

So I was bored on the weekend and this game idea generator thought of this wonderful idea: 

I was so bored so I decided to go ahead and make it. Also I challenged myself to use my own models! Lovely...

So now go and enjoy shooting soldiers to accelerate global warming!

Controls:

Movement: W A S D to move, SPACE to jump, CONTROL to crouch, SHIFT to sprint

Interaction: E to pickup ammo and press buttons, CLICK to shoot, ███ to make yourself immortal (Hint: its the key that means "current position" in minecraft commands)

Enjoy! I challenge you to comment your speedrun times!
